comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Arthur Lovett Garford (1858-1933) was an Ohio industrialist who manufactured bicycles, autos, and trucks. He was active in the Republican Party, and later in the Progressive Party, as well as the Anti-Saloon League. Here's another Bain photo of him, with California Governor Hiram Johnson. The comments below it contain links to more information about Garford.

comment._content: Thanks! We'll fix the title in the source data and reload the description.
